title: Data4UrbanMobility: Data-Driven Mobility Service for Smart Cities

author: Elena Demidova, School of Electronics and Computer Science, University of Southampton

segmentation: We are local German project funded by German Ministry for Research and Education.
We just recently started so much this year and now we're in the very first stage.

We basically look for scenarios for challenges for datasets and trying to shape this and what this picture is showing is basically the overall vision which we designed some time ago as we started to think about what we want to do in this project.

Providers of mobility services, but we also look at city inhabitants and we also look at city planners.
